channel.title: Don't stop at the top
channel.description:
...and keep climbing higher. Climb until you're in the endless void of nowhere. Climb, but don't look back, and don't look back at all. Don't just stand there and do nothing. Act up. Stand for yourself, because no one else will. And only you can. And nobody else. Not your mom, nor your dad.
Don't stop at the top, and don't look back

[/quote]

Great, now I don’t want to eat my bacon sandwich.

item.title: Don't stop at the top
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

“I’m sorry,” the handsome clerk said. “But we do not carry anything on this list.”
I was now infuriated. I was ready to kill that man. But I couldn’t. He was stopping me. As I raised my fist, it fell back down, turning into an open palm as it rushed to the side of leg. What was happening? Who was doing it? And then I fell through. The shards under my feet were falling, and I clearly saw that, but why wasn’t I? I was standing there, staring, almost, into my own reflection.
I wanted to grasp it but I couldn’t. I just couldn’t.

Are we all OK?
No.
And we never will be.

And as I stood there watching, I saw all the memories of the beautiful past. The one which we all want to live in. And I let it go. There it flew away.

Getting smaller.

Smaller…
[size=5pt]Smaller[/size]

Until it vanished into the dark and depressing voids of death.

And I cried.
And so did she.

[quote=“IcyPimp, post:5, topic:53528”]EDIT: ilyaostr9 (I’ll call you ‘Ilyao’), how come it’s str9 and not str8? Are you telling us you’re not straight? You’re strnine?

If so, what the Hell is strnine?[/quote]
ilyaostr9 = my first name + first 4 letters of my last name + 9 (cause i was 9 when i started playing RS, but mainly the nine is cause my main alias is io9, and the nine makes it secksi) = io9 = ilyaostr9

P.S. io9 = ilyaostr9

Read full topic

item.title: Don't stop at the top
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

What you do not know, do not speak of.
Do not try to act above your intellect, for it’ll all end in tears.

Do not try…
Do not attempt…
Don’t even bother…

Read full topic

item.title: Don't stop at the top
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

lelmafgd, I smeel a PaulToneabee.

Yeah, well how’s this for you?

In the end, the sad, cold end, when you realize that you made a mistake, you find it’s too late. You can’t take it back. Uncontrolably, you cry, and as a tear runs down your face, you regret it all. You miss your love. The best thing that ever happened to you is gone, and it seems as though you, too, are fading away.

Read full topic
